      • getInstance

        public static QrInventoryController getInstance()

      • getPlayerInfo

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> getPlayerInfo​(java.lang.String currentPlayer,
                                                                                java.lang.Boolean otherPlayer,
                                                                                @Nullable
                                                                                android.content.Context context,
                                                                                @Nullable
                                                                                java.util.Observer o)
                                                                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Get and return all the data of "currentPlayer" from local file.
        参数:
        currentPlayer - The identifier of the current player
        otherPlayer - if this is asking for other player's data
        context - Activity whichever calls this method
        o - An Activity waiting for this method to be finished
        返回:
        all the information of the current player's document, which is a hashMap
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - if collection name is incorrect

      • getPlayerInfo

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> getPlayerInfo​(java.lang.String currentPlayer)
                                                                         throws java.lang.Exception
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getAndSetQrCodeData

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> getAndSetQrCodeData​(android.content.Context context,
                                                                                      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> qrHashCodes,
                                                                                      android.widget.ArrayAdapter<java.lang.String> qrInventory,
                                                                                      java.lang.String currentPlayer)
                                                                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Get a series of hash codes of qrcode, which is stored in argument "qrHashCodes", then put all the documents of those hash codes from collection "QrCode". It updates player's qrInventory from Firestore to local and displays it on QrInventoryActivity
        参数:
        context - current activity
        qrHashCodes - an ArrayList which has all the qrCodes owned by the current player
        qrInventory - an ArrayList of qrInventory of current player
        currentPlayer - String of the current player
        返回:
        the document of a qrHash
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - if collection name is incorrect

      • getAllComments

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> getAllComments​(DatabaseCallback databaseCallback,
                                                                                 java.lang.String hashName,
                                                                                 java.util.List<java.util.Map> result)
                                                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Gets all the comments of the qrCode 'hashName', and save all tha comments into List(Map) 'result'
        参数:
        databaseCallback - callback object.
        hashName - the qrCode which we want to get all the comments of.
        result - where we store all the comments, format: 'player'(String) : 'comments'(ArrayList(String))
        返回:
        A hashMap that represents comments of this qrcode
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - throws Exception if collection name is incorrect

      • updateQR

        public void updateQR​(java.lang.String qrHash,
                     @Nullable
                     java.lang.Integer score,
                     @Nullable
                     java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> location,
                     @Nullable
                     java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> comments,
                     @Nullable
                     java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> bitmap)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        update a qr's information to Firestore
        参数:
        qrHash - hash of current qr code
        score - score of this qrcode
        location - location where this qrcode is scanned
        comments - comments on this qr code made by player(s)
        bitmap - photo(s) of this qrcode
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - throws Exception if collection name is incorrect
